sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_a43be63c97a03a1022a23717f053af93
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><advanced>true</advanced><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_run_end/><entered_run_start/><entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time><max_drift/><name>CancelGameSessionDueTimeout</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><repeat_every/><run_as display_value="Jakub Žipaj">8ffbcbaf9790721022a23717f053afd0</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_daysofweek/><run_end/><run_month>1</run_month><run_period>1970-01-01 00:00:30</run_period><run_start>2025-10-10 09:55:56</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><run_weekinmonth>1</run_weekinmonth><script><![CDATA[//var shipWarsUtils = new ShipwarsUtils();
//shipwarsUtils.cancelGameSessionDueTimeout();

var now = new GlideDateTime();
var gameSessionGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
gameSessionGR.addQuery("state", "playing");
gameSessionGR.query();

while (gameSessionGR.next()) {
    var lastMoveGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_moves");
    lastMoveGR.addQuery("game_session", gameSessionGR.sys_id);
    lastMoveGR.orderByDesc("sys_created_on");
    lastMoveGR.setLimit(1);
    lastMoveGR.query();

    if (lastMoveGR.next()) {
        var moveTime = new GlideDateTime(lastMoveGR.getValue("sys_created_on"));
        //Option 1
        //moveTime.addSeconds(120);
        //if (moveTime.before(now)) {

        //Option 2
        // 30000 value of 30 seconds in miliseconds
        if (now.getNumericValue() - moveTime.getNumericValue() >= 30000) {
            var winner;
            if (lastMoveGR.state == "waiting_for_shot") {
                winner = lastMoveGR.target;
            } else if (lastMoveGR.state == "waiting_for_answer") {
                winner = lastMoveGR.shooter;
            }

            gameSessionGR.setValue("state", "cancelled");
            gameSessionGR.setValue("by_timeout", true);
            gameSessionGR.setValue("winner", winner);
            gameSessionGR.update();
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jakub</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-10 10:10:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>a43be63c97a03a1022a23717f053af93</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CancelGameSessionDueTimeout</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_a43be63c97a03a1022a23717f053af93</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jakub</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-11 19:58:33</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c0c153f787ac7610a887cbf90cbb35d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1811979_ship_war.ShipWarsAi</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ShipWarsAi</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[/*
 * =====================================================================
 * Script Include: ShipWarsAi
 * Scope: x_1811979_ship_war
 * Client callable: false
 *
 * Description:
 *   Battleship AI: random legal ship placement + shot selection via
 *   target (finish clusters) and hunt (probability heatmap) strategies.
 *   + History utilities (build history from moves table) and
 *     coordinate converters between legacy A0..J9 and AI A1..J10.
 * =====================================================================
 */
"use strict";

var ShipWarsAi = Class.create();
ShipWarsAi.prototype = (function () {
    var GRID_SIZE = 10;
    var UNKNOWN = 0;
    var MISS = -1;
    var HIT = 1;
    var SUNK = 2;

    var SHIPS_DEF = [
        { name: "Carrier",    size: 5, code: "A" },
        { name: "Battleship", size: 4, code: "B" },
        { name: "Cruiser",    size: 3, code: "C" },
        { name: "Submarine",  size: 3, code: "S" },
        { name: "Destroyer",  size: 2, code: "D" }
    ];

    return {

        initialize: function () {},

        // ---------------- Placement ----------------

        runPlacementGrid: function () {
            return this._buildPlacementWithPositions().grid;
        },

        processAI: function () {
            return this.runPlacementGrid();
        },

        getShipPlacementMap: function () {
            var placementResult = this._buildPlacementWithPositions();
            return {
                A: placementResult.positions.A,
                B: placementResult.positions.B,
                C: placementResult.positions.C,
                S: placementResult.positions.S,
                D: placementResult.positions.D,
                hit: [],
                miss: []
            };
        },

        // ---------------- Shooting ----------------

        /**
         * @param {Array<{cell:string,result:"miss"|"hit"|"sunk",ship?:string}>} history
         * @returns {string} "A1".."J10"
         */
        computeNextShot: function (history) {
            var shotsGrid = this._initShotsGrid();
            var remainingShips = this._initRemainingShips();
            var unnamedSunkClusterSizes = [];

            // Build grid from history safely
            for (var i = 0; i < (history || []).length; i++) {
                var hist = history[i];
                if (!hist || !hist.cell || !hist.result)
                    continue;

                var rc = this._fromCoord(hist.cell);
                if (!rc)
                    continue;

                var r = rc.r, c = rc.c;

                if (hist.result === "miss") {
                    shotsGrid[r][c] = MISS;
                } else if (hist.result === "hit") {
                    shotsGrid[r][c] = HIT;
                } else if (hist.result === "sunk") {
                    shotsGrid[r][c] = HIT;
                    var cluster = this._collectHitCluster(shotsGrid, r, c);
                    this._markClusterSunk(shotsGrid, cluster);

                    if (hist.ship && remainingShips[hist.ship] !== undefined) {
                        delete remainingShips[hist.ship];
                    } else {
                        unnamedSunkClusterSizes.push(cluster.length);
                    }
                }
            }

            // Deduce unnamed sunk ships by size
            for (var j = 0; j < unnamedSunkClusterSizes.length; j++) {
                var size = unnamedSunkClusterSizes[j];
                for (var key in remainingShips) {
                    if (remainingShips[key] === size) {
                        delete remainingShips[key];
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }

            // TARGET MODE
            var targetCandidates = this._gatherTargetCandidates(shotsGrid);
            if (targetCandidates.length > 0) {
                var ti = Math.floor(Math.random() * targetCandidates.length);
                var t = targetCandidates[ti];
                return this._toCoord(t.r, t.c);
            }

            // HUNT MODE
            var remainingSizes = this._extractRemainingSizes(remainingShips);
            if (remainingSizes.length === 0) {
                var any = this._findAnyUnknown(shotsGrid);
                return any ? this._toCoord(any.r, any.c) : "A1";
            }

            var heatmap = this._buildHeatmap(shotsGrid, remainingSizes);
            var smallest = this._getSmallestShip(remainingShips);
            var best = this._argMaxHeat(heatmap, shotsGrid, smallest);
            if (best) {
                return this._toCoord(best.r, best.c);
            }

            var fallback = this._findAnyUnknown(shotsGrid);
            return fallback ? this._toCoord(fallback.r, fallback.c) : "A1";
        },

        /**
         * Build history (validated moves only) then compute next shot.
         */
        computeNextShotForSession: function (game_session_id, shooter_id) {
            var history = this.buildMoveHistory(game_session_id, shooter_id);
            return this.computeNextShot(history);
        },

        /**
         * Build move history from table.
         */
        buildMoveHistory: function (game_session_id, shooter_id) {
            var history = [];
            if (!game_session_id || !shooter_id)
                return history;

            var gr = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_moves");
            gr.addQuery("game_session", game_session_id);
            gr.addQuery("shooter", shooter_id);
            gr.addQuery("state", "validated");
            gr.orderBy("turn");
            gr.setLimit(1000);
            gr.query();

            while (gr.next()) {
                var mapped = this._mapMoveRowToHistory(gr);
                if (mapped) {
                    history.push(mapped); // IMPORTANT: skip nulls
                }
            }

            return history;
        },

        // ---------------- Coord utilities ----------------

        normalizeToA1: function (coord) {
            var input = (coord || "").toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            if (!input) return null;

            var col = input.charAt(0);
            if (col < "A" || col > "J") return null;

            var row_str = input.substring(1);

            if (/^[0-9]$/.test(row_str)) {
                var num = parseInt(row_str, 10) + 1;
                return col + num;
            }
            if (/^10$|^[1-9]$/.test(row_str)) {
                return col + row_str;
            }

            return null;
        },

        toLegacyA0: function (coord) {
            var input = (coord || "").toString().trim().toUpperCase();
            if (!input) return null;

            var col = input.charAt(0);
            if (col < "A" || col > "J") return null;

            var row_str = input.substring(1);
            if (!/^10$|^[1-9]$/.test(row_str)) return null;

            var num = parseInt(row_str, 10) - 1;
            return col + num;
        },

        // ---------------- Private helpers ----------------

        _mapMoveRowToHistory: function (row) {
            var raw = row.getValue("coordinates");
            var cell = this.normalizeToA1(raw);
            if (!cell) return null;

            var hit_val = row.getValue("hit");
            var sunk_val = row.getValue("sunk");

            var is_hit = (hit_val === true || hit_val === "true" || hit_val === "1");
            var is_sunk = (sunk_val === true || sunk_val === "true" || sunk_val === "1");

            if (is_sunk) return { cell: cell, result: "sunk" };
            if (is_hit)  return { cell: cell, result: "hit" };
            return { cell: cell, result: "miss" };
        },

        _buildPlacementWithPositions: function () {
            var grid = [];
            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                grid[r] = [];
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    grid[r][c] = UNKNOWN;
                }
            }

            var positions = { A: [], B: [], C: [], S: [], D: [] };

            for (var i = 0; i < SHIPS_DEF.length; i++) {
                var ship = SHIPS_DEF[i];
                var placed = false;
                var attempts = 0;
                var maxAttempts = 500;

                while (!placed && attempts < maxAttempts) {
                    attempts++;
                    var horiz = Math.random() < 0.5;
                    var startR = Math.floor(Math.random() * GRID_SIZE);
                    var startC = Math.floor(Math.random() * GRID_SIZE);
                    var fits = true;

                    for (var s = 0; s < ship.size; s++) {
                        var rr = startR + (horiz ? 0 : s);
                        var cc = startC + (horiz ? s : 0);
                        if (rr >= GRID_SIZE || cc >= GRID_SIZE || grid[rr][cc] !== UNKNOWN) {
                            fits = false;
                            break;
                        }
                    }

                    if (fits) {
                        for (s = 0; s < ship.size; s++) {
                            var wr = startR + (horiz ? 0 : s);
                            var wc = startC + (horiz ? s : 0);
                            grid[wr][wc] = ship.code;
                            positions[ship.code].push(this._toCoord(wr, wc));
                        }
                        placed = true;
                    }
                }

                if (!placed) {
                    // In extreme case, restart placement.
                    return this._buildPlacementWithPositions();
                }
            }

            return { grid: grid, positions: positions };
        },

        _initShotsGrid: function () {
            var g = [];
            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                g[r] = [];
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    g[r][c] = UNKNOWN;
                }
            }
            return g;
        },

        _initRemainingShips: function () {
            return {
                "Carrier": 5,
                "Battleship": 4,
                "Cruiser": 3,
                "Submarine": 3,
                "Destroyer": 2
            };
        },

        _extractRemainingSizes: function (remaining) {
            var sizes = [];
            for (var key in remaining) {
                sizes.push(remaining[key]);
            }
            return sizes;
        },

        _gatherTargetCandidates: function (shotsGrid) {
            var hits = [];
            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    if (shotsGrid[r][c] === HIT) {
                        hits.push({ r: r, c: c });
                    }
                }
            }
            if (!hits.length) return [];

            var candidates = [];
            for (var i = 0; i < hits.length; i++) {
                var h = hits[i];
                this._pushIfUnknown(candidates, shotsGrid, h.r - 1, h.c);
                this._pushIfUnknown(candidates, shotsGrid, h.r + 1, h.c);
                this._pushIfUnknown(candidates, shotsGrid, h.r, h.c - 1);
                this._pushIfUnknown(candidates, shotsGrid, h.r, h.c + 1);
            }

            var seen = {};
            var dedup = [];
            for (var j = 0; j < candidates.length; j++) {
                var key = candidates[j].r + ":" + candidates[j].c;
                if (!seen[key]) {
                    seen[key] = true;
                    dedup.push(candidates[j]);
                }
            }

            return dedup;
        },

        _pushIfUnknown: function (out, grid, r, c) {
            if (!this.checkInsideBoard(r, c)) return;
            if (grid[r][c] === UNKNOWN) out.push({ r: r, c: c });
        },

        _buildHeatmap: function (shotsGrid, shipSizes) {
            var heatmap = [];
            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                heatmap[r] = [];
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    heatmap[r][c] = 0;
                }
            }

            for (var sIndex = 0; sIndex < shipSizes.length; sIndex++) {
                var size = shipSizes[sIndex];

                // Horizontal
                for (var rH = 0; rH < GRID_SIZE; rH++) {
                    for (var cH = 0; cH <= GRID_SIZE - size; cH++) {
                        var okH = this.checkNoMissInSegment(shotsGrid, rH, cH, size, true) &&
                                  this.checkPlacementConsistentWithHits(shotsGrid, rH, cH, size, true);
                        if (okH) {
                            for (var kH = 0; kH < size; kH++) {
                                heatmap[rH][cH + kH]++;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                // Vertical
                for (var cV = 0; cV < GRID_SIZE; cV++) {
                    for (var rV = 0; rV <= GRID_SIZE - size; rV++) {
                        var okV = this.checkNoMissInSegment(shotsGrid, rV, cV, size, false) &&
                                  this.checkPlacementConsistentWithHits(shotsGrid, rV, cV, size, false);
                        if (okV) {
                            for (var kV = 0; kV < size; kV++) {
                                heatmap[rV + kV][cV]++;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            return heatmap;
        },

        checkNoMissInSegment: function (grid, startRow, startCol, size, isHorizontal) {
            for (var o = 0; o < size; o++) {
                var r = startRow + (isHorizontal ? 0 : o);
                var c = startCol + (isHorizontal ? o : 0);
                if (grid[r][c] === MISS) return false;
            }
            return true;
        },

        checkPlacementConsistentWithHits: function (grid, startRow, startCol, size, isHorizontal) {
            var rowMin = startRow;
            var rowMax = startRow + (isHorizontal ? 0 : size - 1);
            var colMin = startCol;
            var colMax = startCol + (isHorizontal ? size - 1 : 0);

            if (isHorizontal) {
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    if (grid[startRow][c] === HIT && (c < colMin || c > colMax)) {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
            } else {
                for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                    if (grid[r][startCol] === HIT && (r < rowMin || r > rowMax)) {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
            }
            return true;
        },

        _argMaxHeat: function (heatmap, grid, parityStride) {
            var bestValue = -1;
            var bestCells = [];

            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    if (grid[r][c] !== UNKNOWN) continue;

                    if (parityStride >= 2 && ((r + c) % 2 !== 0)) continue;

                    var v = heatmap[r][c];
                    if (v > bestValue) {
                        bestValue = v;
                        bestCells = [{ r: r, c: c }];
                    } else if (v === bestValue) {
                        bestCells.push({ r: r, c: c });
                    }
                }
            }

            if (!bestCells.length) return null;

            var i = Math.floor(Math.random() * bestCells.length);
            return bestCells[i];
        },

        _getSmallestShip: function (remainingShips) {
            var min = 99;
            for (var key in remainingShips) {
                if (remainingShips[key] < min) {
                    min = remainingShips[key];
                }
            }
            return (min === 99) ? 1 : min;
        },

        _findAnyUnknown: function (grid) {
            for (var r = 0; r < GRID_SIZE; r++) {
                for (var c = 0; c < GRID_SIZE; c++) {
                    if (grid[r][c] === UNKNOWN) {
                        return { r: r, c: c };
                    }
                }
            }
            return null;
        },

        _collectHitCluster: function (grid, seedRow, seedCol) {
            var queue = [{ r: seedRow, c: seedCol }];
            var cluster = [];
            var visited = {};

            while (queue.length) {
                var cur = queue.shift();
                var key = cur.r + ":" + cur.c;
                if (visited[key]) continue;
                visited[key] = true;

                var state = grid[cur.r][cur.c];
                if (state === HIT || state === SUNK) {
                    cluster.push(cur);
                    var neighbors = [
                        { r: cur.r - 1, c: cur.c },
                        { r: cur.r + 1, c: cur.c },
                        { r: cur.r, c: cur.c - 1 },
                        { r: cur.r, c: cur.c + 1 }
                    ];
                    for (var i = 0; i < neighbors.length; i++) {
                        var n = neighbors[i];
                        if (this.checkInsideBoard(n.r, n.c)) {
                            queue.push(n);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            return cluster;
        },

        _markClusterSunk: function (grid, cluster) {
            for (var i = 0; i < cluster.length; i++) {
                var c = cluster[i];
                grid[c.r][c.c] = SUNK;
            }
        },

        checkInsideBoard: function (r, c) {
            return (r >= 0 && r < GRID_SIZE && c >= 0 && c < GRID_SIZE);
        },

        _fromCoord: function (coord) {
            if (!coord || typeof coord !== "string") return null;
            var input = coord.toUpperCase().trim();
            var colChar = input.charAt(0);
            var colIndex = colChar.charCodeAt(0) - "A".charCodeAt(0);
            var rowIndex = parseInt(input.substring(1), 10) - 1;
            if (isNaN(rowIndex) || colIndex < 0 || colIndex > 9 || rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex > 9)
                return null;
            return { r: rowIndex, c: colIndex };
        },

        _toCoord: function (r, c) {
            var colLetter = String.fromCharCode("A".charCodeAt(0) + c);
            var rowNumber = r + 1;
            return colLetter + rowNumber;
        },

        type: "ShipWarsAi"
    };
}());
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-19 20:26:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>c0c153f787ac7610a887cbf90cbb35d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShipWarsAi</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c0c153f787ac7610a887cbf90cbb35d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-11 15:41:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_c798bcc833a4b21017ea413fad5c7bad
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Countries Import Map">f83834c833a4b21017ea413fad5c7bd6</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>u_un_numeric</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1811979_ship_war_game_session</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1811979_ship_war_game_session">stateVALCHANGES^state=cancelled^by_requestVALCHANGES^by_request=true^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="Cancelled" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="cancelled"/><item endquery="false" field="by_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="by_request" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Cancel The Game Due To Request</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var shipwarsRestAPIUtils = new ShipwarsRestAPIUtils();

	var body = {
		gameID : current.getValue("number"),
		gameState : "cancelled",
		winner : true
	};
	
	var winnerEndpoint = current.winner.endpoint;

	shipwarsRestAPIUtils.sendAsyncRequest(body, winnerEndpoint, "GAME_CANCEL");

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ado</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-09 11:19:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1751b1649764b61022a23717f053afa8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cancel The Game Due To Request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1751b1649764b61022a23717f053afa8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ado</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-23 18:01:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1751b1649764b61022a23717f053afa8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_48470e5f83072210171dc900feaad318
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1811979_ship_war.ShipwarsValidation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ShipwarsValidation</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var ShipwarsValidation = Class.create();

ShipwarsValidation.REFERENCE = Object.freeze([
    ["D", 2],
    ["S", 3],
    ["C", 3],
    ["A", 5],
    ["B", 4]
]);

ShipwarsValidation.KEYS = Object.freeze({
    JOIN: Object.freeze({
        playerID: 'string',
        playField: 'object',
        multiplayer: 'boolean',
        tournament: 'boolean',
        endpoint: 'string'
    }),
    SHOT: Object.freeze({
        playerID: 'string',
        gameID: 'string',
        coordinates: 'string'
    }),
    HIT: Object.freeze({
        playerID: 'string',
        gameID: 'string',
        hit: 'boolean',
        sunk: 'boolean',
        end: 'boolean'
    }),
    CANCEL: Object.freeze({
        playerID: 'string',
        gameID: 'string'
    })
});

ShipwarsValidation.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.errorHandler = new ShipwarsErrorHandling();
    },

    // playField value format : 
    // var playField = {
    //     D: ["A1", "A2"],
    //     S: ["B5", "C5", "D5"],
    //     C: ["F3", "F4", "F5"],
    //     A: ["H1", "H2", "H3", "H4", "H5"],
    //     B: ["D8", "E8", "F8", "G8"]
    // }

    //request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    //requestType (string) -> type of request to know what to validate
    // function validates request and returns validation result
    validateRequest: function(request, requestType) {
        var keys = ShipwarsValidation.KEYS[requestType];
        switch (requestType) {
            case 'JOIN':
                return this._validateJoin(request, keys);
            case 'SHOT':
                return this._validateShot(request, keys);
            case 'HIT':
                return this._validateHit(request, keys);
            case 'CANCEL':
                return this._validateCancel(request, keys);

        }
    },

    _validateCancel: function(request, keys) {
        var result;
        result = this._areKeysPresent(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._areKeysFormatsValid(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var playerID = request.playerID;
        result = this._doesPlayerExist(playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var gameID = request.gameID;
        result = this._isGameValidForCancel(gameID, playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // keys (Object) -> contains reference on what is expected in request and whether it has the right dataType
    // request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    // function validates 'HIT' request
    _validateHit: function(request, keys) {
        var result;
        result = this._areKeysPresent(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._areKeysFormatsValid(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var playerID = request.playerID;
        result = this._doesPlayerExist(playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var gameID = request.gameID;
        result = this._isGameValid(gameID, playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var hit = request.hit;
        var sunk = request.sunk;
        result = this._isHitAndSunkValid(hit, sunk);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // keys (Object) -> contains reference on what is expected in request and whether it has the right dataType
    // request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    // function validates 'SHOT' request
    _validateShot: function(request, keys) {
        var result;
        result = this._areKeysPresent(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._areKeysFormatsValid(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var playerID = request.playerID;
        result = this._doesPlayerExist(playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        var gameID = request.gameID;
        result = this._isGameValid(gameID, playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }

        result = this._isMoveReady(gameID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            gs.info("toto neprešlo?");
            return result;
        }

        result = this._isShootersTurn(gameID, playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            gs.info("Alebo toto neprešlo?")
            return result;
        }

        var position = request.coordinates;
        if (!this._isPositionFormatValid(position)) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('FORMAT', position)
            };
        }
        result = this._isDuplicateShot(gameID, playerID, position);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //note : pridať validáciu toho, či hráč, ktorý sa snaží pripojiť, už je v nejakej hre, ktorá práve prebieha.
    // keys (Object) -> contains reference on what is expected in request and whether it has the right dataType
    // request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    // function validates 'JOIN' request
    _validateJoin: function(request, keys) {
        var result;
        result = this._areKeysPresent(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._areKeysFormatsValid(request, keys);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }

        var playerID = request.playerID;
        result = this._doesPlayerExist(playerID);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }

        result = this._isPlayerInGame(playerID); // treba otestovať!
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }

        // TOTO ODKOMENTOVAŤ A UPRAVIŤ
        // var endpoint = request.endpoint;
        // result = this._isEndpointValid(endpoint);
        // if (!result.passed) {
        //     return result;
        // }

        if (request.tournament) {
            result = this.isTournamentAndMultiplayerTrue(request);
            if (!result.passed) {
                return result;
            }
            result = this.isTournamentOn();
            if (!result.passed) {
                return result;
            }
            result = this.isTournamentSessionPresent(playerID);
            if (!result.passed) {
                return result;
            }
        }

        var playField = request.playField;
        result = this._validatePlayField(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // hit ( boolean ) -> whether the shot was a hit or not
    // sunk ( boolean ) -> whether the ship was sunk or not
    // function validates, whether if there is a sunk, there's also a hit
    _isHitAndSunkValid: function(hit, sunk) {
        if (!hit && sunk) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('SUNK_WITHOUT_HIT')
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // gameID ( string ) -> unique identifier of a game
    // playerID ( string sys_id ) -> sysID of user
    //function validates, whether the user and game record exist, whether the user is assigned to the said game and whether the game is in state 'playing'
    _isGameValid: function(gameID, playerID) {
        var game = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        game.addQuery('number', gameID);
        game.query();
        if (!game.next()) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('GAME_NOT_FOUND', gameID)
            };
        }
        if (game.getValue("player_1") != playerID && game.getValue("player_2") != playerID) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('PLAYER_NOT_IN_GAME', playerID)
            };
        }
        if (game.getValue("state") != "playing") {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('GAME_NOT_IN_PROGRESS', gameID)
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };

    },

    _isGameValidForCancel: function(gameID, playerID) {
        var game = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        game.addQuery('number', gameID);
        game.query();
        if (!game.next()) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('GAME_NOT_FOUND', gameID)
            };
        }
        if (game.getValue("player_1") != playerID && game.getValue("player_2") != playerID) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('PLAYER_NOT_IN_GAME', playerID)
            };
        }
        if (game.getValue("state") != "initialized" && game.getValue("state") != "playing" && game.getValue("state") != "waiting_for_opponent") {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('GAME_NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_CANCEL', gameID)
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };

    },

    // endpoint ( string URL ) -> player endpoint
    // function checks, whether the given endpoint is valid ( it returns an answer)
    _isEndpointValid: function(endpoint) {
        //NEEDS TO BE POLISHED
        var test = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        test.setEndpoint(endpoint + "/gameUpdate");
        test.setHttpMethod('POST');
        test.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        test.setRequestBody('{"type":"PING"}');
        test.setHttpTimeout(5000); // 5s

        try {
            var response = test.execute();
            var responseCode = response.getStatusCode();
            if (((responseCode >= 200 && responseCode < 300) || responseCode === 401 || responseCode === 403 || responseCode === 404 || responseCode === 405)) {
                return {
                    passed: true
                };
            }
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('INVALID_ENDPOINT')
            };

        } catch (error) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('INVALID_ENDPOINT')
            };
        }
    },

    // playerID ( string sys_id ) -> sysID of user
    // function checks, whether the user record exists
    _doesPlayerExist: function(playerID) {
        var playerGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_teams");
        if (!playerGR.get(playerID)) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('PLAYER_NOT_FOUND')
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },


    // keys (Object) -> contains reference on what is expected in request and whether it has the right dataType
    // request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    // function checks, whether requested keys are present in the request
    _areKeysPresent: function(request, keys) {
        var missingKeys = [];

        for (var key in keys) {
            if (!request.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
                missingKeys.push(key);
            }
        }
        if (missingKeys.length > 0) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('KEYS_MISSING', missingKeys.join(', '))
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // keys (Object) -> contains reference on what is expected in request and whether it has the right dataType
    // request (Object)-> request that comes from the user
    // function checks, whether the request has keys with given datatype
    _areKeysFormatsValid: function(request, keys) {
        var invalidFormatKeys = [];
        for (var key in keys) {
            if (keys[key] == 'array') {
                if (!Array.isArray(request[key])) {
                    invalidFormatKeys.push(key);
                }
            } else if (keys[key] == 'object' && (typeof(request[key]) != 'object' || Array.isArray(request[key]))) {
                invalidFormatKeys.push(key);
            } else {
                if (typeof(request[key]) !== keys[key]) {
                    invalidFormatKeys.push(key);
                }
            }
        }
        if (invalidFormatKeys.length > 0) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('WRONG_KEY_FORMAT', invalidFormatKeys.join(', '))
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },


    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user 
    // function validates everything regarding the playField
    _validatePlayField: function(playField) {
        var reference = ShipwarsValidation.REFERENCE;
        var result;
        result = this._isShipCountValid(playField, reference);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._isShipTypeValid(playField, reference);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._areArrays(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._isShipPositionsFormatValid(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._isShipPositionValid(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._doShipsIntersect(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        result = this._doShipsAlign(playField);
        if (!result.passed) {
            return result;
        }
        return result;
    },

    //position ( string ) -> for example - "A4"
    // function checks, whether the given position is in the desired format
    _isPositionFormatValid: function(position) {
        var positionReference = /^[A-J][0-9]$/;
        return positionReference.test(position);
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    //reference ( object ) -> what ships we expected with what length
    //  function checks, whether the count of the ship is right
    _isShipCountValid: function(playField, reference) {
        if (Object.keys(playField).length != reference.length) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('COUNT')
            };

        } else {
            return {
                passed: true
            };
        }
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    //reference ( object ) -> what ships we expected with what length
    //  function checks, whether the required ship types are present
    _isShipTypeValid: function(playField, reference) {
        for (var x = 0; x < reference.length; x++) {
            var shipReferenceLength = reference[x][1];
            var shipType = playField[reference[x][0]];
            if (!shipType) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('TYPE', reference[x][0])
                };
            } else if (shipReferenceLength != shipType.length) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('LENGTH', reference[x][0])
                };
            }
        }

        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    // function checks, whether under everyship key, there's a value in array format
    _areArrays: function(playField) {
        for (var type in playField) {
            if (!Array.isArray(playField[type])) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('NOT_ARRAY', type)
                };
            }
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    //function checks, whether every ship position is in the right format
    _isShipPositionsFormatValid: function(playField) {
        for (var type in playField) {
            for (var x = 0; x < playField[type].length; x++) {
                if (!this._isPositionFormatValid(playField[type][x])) {
                    return {
                        passed: false,
                        error: this.errorHandler.buildError('FORMAT', playField[type][x])
                    };
                }
            }
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    // function checks, whether, based on the ships positions, the ships are contigous
    _isShipPositionValid: function(playField) {
        for (var type in playField) {

            var isRow = this._isShipInRow(playField[type]);
            var isCol = this._isShipInColumn(playField[type]);
            if (isRow == isCol) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('CONTIGUITY', type)
                };
            }
            var shipLocations = [];
            if (isRow) {
                for (var x = 0; x < playField[type].length; x++) {
                    shipLocations.push(playField[type][x].charAt(0));
                }
            } else if (isCol) {
                for (var x = 0; x < playField[type].length; x++) {
                    shipLocations.push(playField[type][x].charAt(1));
                }
            }

            if (!this._isShipContiguous(shipLocations)) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('CONTIGUITY', type)
                };
            }
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //shipLocations ( array ) -> everyposition of a certain shiptype
    // functions checks, whether the ship is placed in a column
    _isShipInColumn: function(shipLocations) {
        for (var x = 0; x < shipLocations.length; x++) {
            if (shipLocations[0].charAt(0) != shipLocations[x].charAt(0)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    },

    //shipLocations ( array ) -> everyposition of a certain shiptype
    // functions checks, whether the ship is placed in a row
    _isShipInRow: function(shipLocations) {
        for (var x = 0; x < shipLocations.length; x++) {
            if (shipLocations[0].charAt(1) != shipLocations[x].charAt(1)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    },

    ////shipLocations ( array ) -> everyposition of a certain shiptype
    // functions checks, whether the ship is contigous
    _isShipContiguous: function(shipLocations) {
        var shipLength = shipLocations.length;
        for (var x = 0; x < shipLength; x++) {
            for (var y = x + 1; y < shipLength; y++) {
                if (
                    Math.abs(
                        shipLocations[x].charCodeAt(0) - shipLocations[y].charCodeAt(0)
                    ) >= shipLength
                ) {
                    return false;
                }
            }
        }
        return true;
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    // function checks, whether there is no ship that crosses other one
    _doShipsIntersect: function(playField) {
        var locationPresent = {};
        for (var type in playField) {
            for (var x = 0; x < playField[type].length; x++) {
                if (locationPresent[playField[type][x]]) {
                    return {
                        passed: false,
                        error: this.errorHandler.buildError('OVERLAP', playField[type][x])
                    };
                } else {
                    locationPresent[playField[type][x]] = true;
                }
            }
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    //playField ( object ) -> location of every ship of the user
    // function checks, whether there are ships directly next to each other
    _doShipsAlign: function(playField) {
        var shipsPositions = {};

        for (var type in playField) {
            for (var x = 0; x < playField[type].length; x++) {
                shipsPositions[playField[type][x]] = type;
            }
        }

        for (var position in shipsPositions) {
            var neighbours = this._getNeighbours(position);
            for (var x = 0; x < neighbours.length; x++) {
                if (
                    shipsPositions[neighbours[x]] &&
                    shipsPositions[neighbours[x]] != shipsPositions[position]
                ) {
                    return {
                        passed: false,
                        error: this.errorHandler.buildError('ADJACENT', neighbours[x])
                    };
                }
            }
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // position ( string ) -> for example ("A4")
    //function returns an array of positions, that are neighbouring the input position
    _getNeighbours: function(position) {
        var neighbours = [];
        for (var x = -1; x <= 1; x++) {
            for (var y = -1; y <= 1; y++) {
                var column = position.charCodeAt(0);
                var row = position.charCodeAt(1);
                column += x;
                row += y;
                var neighbour = String.fromCharCode(column) + String.fromCharCode(row);
                if (neighbour !== position && this._isPositionFormatValid(neighbour)) {
                    neighbours.push(neighbour);
                }
            }
        }
        return neighbours;
    },

    _isMoveReady: function(gameID) {
        var gameSessionGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        gameSessionGR.get("number", gameID);
        var gameSessionID = gameSessionGR.getUniqueValue();
        var moveGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_moves");
        moveGR.addQuery("game_session", gameSessionID);
        moveGR.addQuery("state", "waiting_for_shot");
        moveGR.query();
        gs.info("AĎO TEST GAME SESSION: " + gameSessionID);
        if (!moveGR.next()) {
            gs.info("NEPREŠLO???");
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('MOVE_NOT_READY')
            };
        }
        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    // coordinates (string) -> napr. "B9"
    // kontrola, či ten istý hráč už v tej istej hre nestrieľal na tie isté súradnice
    _isDuplicateShot: function(gameID, shooter, coordinates) {
        var gameSessionGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");

        var gameSessionID = gameSessionGR.getUniqueValue();

        var moveGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_moves");
        moveGR.addQuery("game_session", gameSessionID);
        moveGR.addQuery("shooter", shooter);
        moveGR.addQuery("coordinates", coordinates);
        moveGR.query();

        if (moveGR.next()) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('DUPLICITE_SHOOT', coordinates)
            };
        }

        return {
            passed: true
        };
    },

    _isShootersTurn: function(gameID, shooter) {
        gameSessionGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        gameSessionGR.get("number", gameID);
        var gameSessionID = gameSessionGR.getUniqueValue();

        var moveGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_moves");
        moveGR.addQuery("game_session", gameSessionID);
        moveGR.addQuery("state", "waiting_for_shot");
        moveGR.query();
        moveGR.next();
        if (moveGR.shooter != shooter) {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('NOT_YOUR_TURN')
            };
        } else {
            return {
                passed: true
            };
        }

    },

    _isPlayerInGame: function(playerID) {
        gameSession = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        //gameSession.addQuery("tournament", true);
        var stateCondition = gameSession.addQuery("state", "waiting_for_opponent");
        stateCondition.addOrCondition("state", "playing");
        stateCondition.addOrCondition("state", "initialized");
        var playerCondition = gameSession.addQuery("player_1", playerID);
        playerCondition.addOrCondition("player_2", playerID);
        gameSession.query();
        if (gameSession.next()) {
            if ((gameSession.player_1 == playerID && gameSession.player_1_present) || (gameSession.player_2 == playerID && gameSession.player_2_present)) {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('ALREADY_IN_GAME', gameSession.getValue("number"))
                };
            }
        }

        return {
            passed: true
        };

    },

    isTournamentAndMultiplayerTrue: function(request) {
        if (request.tournament) {
            if (request.multiplayer) {
                return {
                    passed: true
                };
            } else {
                return {
                    passed: false,
                    error: this.errorHandler.buildError('SINGLEPLAYER_TOURNAMENT') // nový error
                };
            }
        }
    },

    isTournamentOn: function() {
        if (gs.getProperty('x_1811979_ship_war.tournament') == 'true') {
            return {
                passed: true
            };
        } else {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('TOURNAMENT_NOT_RUNNING')
            };
        }
    },
    isTournamentSessionPresent: function(playerID) {
        gameSessionGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_game_session");
        gameSessionGR.addQuery("tournament", true);
        var stateCondition = gameSessionGR.addQuery("state", "initialized");
        stateCondition.addOrCondition("state", "waiting_for_opponent");
        var playerCondition = gameSessionGR.addQuery("player_1", playerID);
        playerCondition.addOrCondition("player_2", playerID);
        gameSessionGR.query();
        if (gameSessionGR.next()) {
            return {
                passed: true
            };
        } else {
            return {
                passed: false,
                error: this.errorHandler.buildError('TOURNAMENT_SESSION_NOT_PRESENT')
            };
        }
    },


    type: 'ShipwarsValidation'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AdrianCubak</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 12:09:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>48470e5f83072210171dc900feaad318</sys_id><sys_mod_count>57</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShipwarsValidation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48470e5f83072210171dc900feaad318</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>terka</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 15:20:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include><sys_es_latest_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><id>48470e5f83072210171dc900feaad318</id><sys_created_by>PetrKana</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-04 12:35:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf3d8e9383472210171dc900feaad363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>PetrKana</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-04 12:35:41</sys_updated_on><table>sys_script_include</table><use_es_latest>true</use_es_latest></sys_es_latest_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="u_reg_xmap_942416">97c5f1a03368761017ea413fad5c7ba7</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>phone</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="DELETE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow read for records in x_1811979_ship_war_teams, for users with roles (snc_external, x_1811979_ship_war.team_updateSet_access), and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams.name</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var user = gs.getUser();
var userEmail = user.getEmail();

var contestantGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_contestants");
contestantGR.addQuery("x_1811979_regist_team", current.sys_id);
contestantGR.query();

while (contestantGR.next()) {
    if (contestantGR.email == userEmail) {
        answer = true;
        break;

    }
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jakub</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-26 15:44:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>1bbdf1c887617610a887cbf90cbb3506</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams.name</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_1bbdf1c887617610a887cbf90cbb3506</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jakub</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 15:44:42</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_60de4af133e4321017ea413fad5c7bf7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Jakub_test</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var shipValidation = new ShipwarsValidation();
    var shipwarsUtils = new ShipwarsUtils();
    var requestData = request.body.data;

    var validation = shipValidation.validateRequest(requestData, 'SHOT');
    if (!validation.passed) {
        var responseBody = {
            validation: validation,
            payload: requestData
        };
        response.setStatus(validation.error.code);
        response.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        response.setBody(responseBody);
        return response;
    }

	var gameEngineResponse = shipwarsUtils.shipGameEngine(requestData);


    response.setStatus(201);
    response.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    response.setBody(gameEngineResponse);

    return response;

var user = gs.getUser();
var userEmail = user.getEmail();

var contestantGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_contestants");

contestantGR.query();

}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jakub</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-26 15:01:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>63a3f18887217610a887cbf90cbb356f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_63a3f18887217610a887cbf90cbb356f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jakub</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 15:01:26</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="DELETE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow read for all fields in x_1811979_ship_war_teams, for users with role snc_external, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing>Existing</local_or_existing><name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams.*</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var user = gs.getUser();
var userEmail = user.getEmail();

var contestantGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_contestants");
contestantGR.addQuery("x_1811979_regist_team", current.sys_id);
contestantGR.query();

while (contestantGR.next()) {
    if (contestantGR.email == userEmail) {
        answer = true;
        break;

    }
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jakub</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-26 15:49:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>55ae790c87617610a887cbf90cbb358e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_55ae790c87617610a887cbf90cbb358e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jakub</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 15:49:44</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><applies_to/><condition/><controlled_by_refs/><decision_type>allow</decision_type><description>Allow read for records in x_1811979_ship_war_teams, for users with roles (snc_external, x_1811979_ship_war.team_updateSet_access), and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var user = gs.getUser();
var userEmail = user.getEmail();

var contestantGR = new GlideRecord("x_1811979_ship_war_contestants");
contestantGR.addQuery("x_1811979_regist_team", current.sys_id);
contestantGR.query();

while (contestantGR.next()) {
    if (contestantGR.email == userEmail) {
        answer = true;
        break;

    }
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jakub</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-11-26 11:00:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>8d77b848c32d361054c17523e40131fd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1811979_ship_war_teams</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Ship wars" source="x_1811979_ship_war">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ship wars">248f874283032210171dc900feaad3b6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_8d77b848c32d361054c17523e40131fd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jakub</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-11-26 15:44:26</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
